description:
VM status keeps shown as RESIZE even if the host of the VM is down

Steps to recreate this issue:
1. Create a Hyper-v VM 
2. Resize the VM to a larger disk size
3. During the resizing, shutdown the host of the VM
4. The VM status will keeps shown as RESIZE

the VM should be in a status like UNKNOWN.
title: [Hyper-V] VM status keeps shown as RESIZE even if the host of the VM is down
